n = int(input())
l = list(map(int, input().split()))
ans = 0
for i in range(n-1):
    for j in range(i+1, n):
        ans += l[i] * l[j]
print(ans % (10**9+7))

N = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 0

for i in range(N):
    for j in range(N):
        if i < j:
            count += A[i] * A[j]

print(count % (10 ** 9 + 7))

print(ans % (10**9 + 7))

n = int(input())
l = list(map(int, input().split()))
ans = 0
for i in range(n-1):
    for j in range(i+1, n):
        ans += l[i] * l[j]
print(ans % (10**9+7))


N = int(input())

A.sort()
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 0

for i in range(N - 1):
    for j in range(i + 1, N):
        count += A[i] * A[j]

print(count % (10 ** 9 + 7))
